name: System Compatibility
description: By researching and having your mech be rebuilt the systems your put in your mech lock in seamlessly causing you to have more space for even more systems.

name: Reinforced Frame 2
description: The addition of redundant shock-absorption systems increases the survivability of pilots in combat, flight, and industrial situations.

name: Well Maintained Weapons
effect: Give reliable +2 to one weapon. This stacks with regular reliable.
description: Being diligent in maintaining your weapons allows comes with benefits. You can always count on them when to fight is rough
mounted_effect: One weapon equipped to this mount gains reliable +2. This stacks with regular reliable.

name: Signal Amplifiers
effect: Immunity from Jammed condition as you treat is as Impaired
description: Augments the sensor and electronics suite of the mech. Due to an increased sensor strength you treat Jammed as it as Impaired.

name: Grabby Hands
effect: 1/Turn: When a mech ends their turn within Threat 3 of you, you may pull them adjacent to you as a reaction.
description: Come over here... I dont bite hehehehe
